text: The 1950 Yugoslav First Basketball League season is the 6th season of the Yugoslav First Basketball League, the highest professional basketball league in SFR Yugoslavia. == Regular season == === League table === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! width=20| !! width=200|Teams !! !! width=20| !! width=20| !! width=20| !! width=35| !! width=35| !! Champion or relegation |- bgcolor=gold | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||32||18||16||2||839||565||Champion |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Partizan ||32||18||16||2||791||613 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Železničar Ljubljana ||22||18||11||7||691||635 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text-align:left;"| BSK ||20||18||10||8||656||697 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Mladost ||18||18||9||9||626||615 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Železničar Belgrade ||16||18||8||10||676||658 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Zadar ||14||18||7||11||543||645 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text- align:left;"| Jedinstvo ||10||18||5||13||684||766 |- align=center | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||10||18||5||13||572||689 |- align=center | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Enotnost ||6||18||3||15||614||809 |} == Winning Roster == The winning roster of Crvena Zvezda: * Nebojša Popović * Milan Bjegojević * Ladislav Demšar * Strahinja Alagić * Aleksandar Gec * Milorad Sokolović * Srđan Kalember * Borislav Ćurčić * Dimitrije Krstić * Tullio Rochlitzer * Borko Jovanović * Đorđe Andrijašević * Stevan Aleksić Coach: Nebojša Popović == External links == * Yugoslav First Basketball League Archive 1950
title: 1950 Yugoslav First Basketball League
